text: "Absurd" (stylized as "ABSUÐ¯D") is a 2021 song by American rock band Guns N' Roses. It is the first new material since 2008 and the first since their sixth studio album Chinese Democracy. The reworked version made its live debut in August 2021 in Boston. ==References== Category:2021 songs Category:Hard rock songs Category:Industrial rock songs Category:Punk rock songs Category:Electronic rock songs Category:Guns N' Roses songs
title: Absurd (song)
